title: GetPost
extract: In computing, POST is a request method supported by HTTP used by the World Wide Web. ... As part of a POST request, an arbitrary amount of data of any type can be sent to the server in the body of the request message. A header field in the POST request usually indicates the message body's Internet media type.
extract_html: In computing, POST is a request method supported by HTTP used by the World Wide Web. ... As part of a POST request, an arbitrary amount of data of any type can be sent to the server in the body of the request message. A header field in the POST request usually indicates the message body's Internet media type.
